attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I felt the need to make a change. After a short period of having this app I saw my front camera kept turning on and the flash on my phone would go off once in awhile. I reported the incident via email and when they reached out to reply back all they said was “You are asian fix it yourself” talk about racial stereotypes. I had to get a new phone and change my number because the app kept messing with the work I was doing on my phone. Never downloading it again worst app ever! This is such an unprofessional app which provides useless information.
attributes.title: HACKED MY PHONE

attributes.review: If I could rate this app 0 I would. This app took forever to download and gave me no information that I couldn’t find on the news. It also gave me no valid reasons to vote for trump in 2020. The economy has not gotten better, society hates eachother, and trump is planning to take down tik tok which is an app that promotes self love, provides income to some people, and helps with communication during corona virus. If an app is better than a president should he really be voted on in 2020. This app is unhelpful, non informing, and keeps us from change the same way our president does! Keep Tiktok and vote anyone else as president in 2020!
attributes.title: I can’t rate it 0

attributes.review: so i downloaded this app the support the one and only trump. before this app i supported him. i was on the app minding my own business and then i got a text, it said be there in 10. no idea what it meant. 10 minutes later i see a TANK come cruising INTO MY HOUSE. my house has 2 floors and i was the only one on the top floor. i had to jump out of my window and i broke my leg. my dad and brother are DEAD BECAUSE OF HIM!!! i believe all of this was because of this app because on it it asked for my number and i put it in. it didn’t tell me it was going to TRACK MY PHONE AND AND TRY TO KILL ME. DONT BY THIS APP I DONT WANT TO SEE ANY OF THIS HAPPEN TO OTHERS!!!!
attributes.title: TRUMPS A KILLER

attributes.review: I was disappointed in this app🤮 it was a pleasant morning and I has just got done with my daily screams of ALL LIVES MATTER. 💅 so I decided to download this app because my friends name Susan and Janice said our hot President made it and I needed to check it out😩✌️🥰 I had never seen our President before and I was so confused and tramatized when I opened the app and saw this orange man who looked like he had been stuck in a peach for 194 years, 😳😳🤮🤮🤮🤮my kids were traumatized and wouldn't stop screaming every night that the monster 👹 under their bed was on tv. had to send me kids to therapy. BAD APP 😳😳🤮🤮😭😭😭🤮🤮😳😳😳🤮🤮😩😩😩😭
attributes.title: HORRIBLE😩😳🤬🤮

attributes.review: The night I got this app I woke up in middle of a room with bright white lights and in a shark invested tank on nothing but a mattress! I tried swimming out of the tank when the sharks were distracted eating children’s fingers. However they heard me splashing in the water and they all start zooming to me. It comes to my attention that all of these sharks have trumps face instead of a normal sharks face. I scramble out of the tank and  see a whole army of walking trump faced sharks. I managed to get out of the strange lab I was in but to this day I still wake up to my sleep paralysis demon that happens to be the trump faced shark. Don’t get this app it’ll ruin you forever !
attributes.title: horrible!

attributes.review:
worst app ever!!

i downloaded this app to try and see my fathers conservative views and why he loves the orange cheeto but it just turned me away even more! when i opened the app i was rudely scared by a picture of some orange monster with a pig hair🐷 toupee and dropped my phone and shattered it. next, the app asked me to share my location so that it could give me rally updates, but i ended up walking into my backyard and found the cheeto himself yelling war cries and yodeling “make america great” over and over again as he danced around my fire pit🔥. i had to let my dogs🐶 out to chase him away, they almost went rabid, and somehow the extremely obese cheeto managed to hobble his way out of my back yard and take flight on top of the nazi eagle back to his home in hell👿 . if i could give this app less than 1 star i would, it is deeply disturbing and no one should have to deal with this any more. let’s fix this in november. 🖋
attributes.title: do not get this!!

attributes.review: I thought all these Gen Z people were trying to take the app down but they were 100% right about it. Right as i downloaded the app my mole rat took out my pet frogs eyes and sautéed them! He then committed arson and my house was burnt to a crisp. The Cheeto man then started following me whilst i was walking to my friends house. He then continued the strip naked and try to give me A LAP DANCE! The horror i felt in that moment was unbelievable. But my mole rat came to the rescue (or so i thought). He bit of Cheeto mans peñis so that it was only half an inch! And then my rat set himself on fire! I was so traumatized by all of this that i had to go to therapy. DO NOT GET THIS APP!!!
attributes.title: My mole rat committed arson

attributes.title: stan ateez❤️✨

attributes.review:
As much as I love my Cheetoh president. I can’t believe the type of things that I ask you to do in the terms and conditions. I couldn’t possibly begin to list the type of things you have to do in order to get Reward Points. 
You have to denounce your morals, tell a baby to get out of the room because they are crying, say one thing but mean another and then go back to first thing you said and tell people they can’t take a joke, say you read the Bible but can’t quote it, and essentially lose ones credibility by following a senile old man. 
I think the app is cursed.
attributes.title: Read Terms before logging in

attributes.review: This man is a disgrace to everyone that lives in America. This app was stupid. What was the purpose? WHAT WAS THE PURPOSE!!!! He’s racist, homophobic, a pedo, and not very intelligent man. I had argument about trump and how he isn’t the brightest and the snowflake conservative said “he’s actually really smart” he’s smart? How about the time he said the j in Donald J Trump stands for genius? Or the time he told the ENTIRE COUNTRY to inject Lysol in us? The list goes on and on, but I really hope he isn’t our president this year. I mean everyone that could have gone in 2020 has gone wrong so I honestly won’t be surprised if he wins again 😔😔. #IMissBernieBruh #Acab #BLM #TheMannyWillNotBeTelivised
